about.recommendation:
I had the privilege of working and teaching Mohammad in a few course during his time at Conestoga. Definetly one of the 'stars' we had come through the program. Always helping and contributing with great ideas and even better questions to challenge mine and his knowledge. To me, that is a sign of a student looking to name for themselves by proving their abilities through hard work. Great job Mohammad and all the best!
-JohnPrinz
HeadofDepartment
ConestogaCollege
